name: saucedemo-typescript-automation
description: Selenium WebDriver test automation framework for SauceDemo using TypeScript

scripts.test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha
scripts.test:login: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha 'dist/tests/login.test.js'
scripts.test:products: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha 'dist/tests/products.test.js'
scripts.test:cart: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha 'dist/tests/cart.test.js'
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha 'dist/tests/e2e.test.js'
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build && cross-env BROWSER=chrome NODE_ENV=test mocha
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build && cross-env BROWSER=firefox NODE_ENV=test mocha
scripts.test:headless: npm run build && cross-env HEADLESS=true NODE_ENV=test mocha
scripts.test:parallel: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --parallel

author: othaimeen
